GSD.description:
scsi: ufs: Fix a deadlock in the error handler

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.11 by commit d69d98d8edf90e25e4e09930dd36dd6d09dd6768. For more details please see the references link.
